entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:11 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: WNW 32 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
